hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.ZR Frogs Ocarina Game: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?
